42 
43  enum class BlitMask {
44  kColorBit = GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT,
45  kDepthBit = GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT,
46  kStencilBit = GL_STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT,
47  kDepthStencilBit = kDepthBit | kStencilBit
48  };
49 
50  enum class BufferAttachmentType {
51  kTexture, // Use textures wherever possible
52  kRBO // Use RBOs wherever possible
53  };
54 
55  enum class BindType {
56  kRead = GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER,
57  kWrite = GL_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER
58  };

127  template<typename T>
128  void readColorPixels(uint32_t attachmentIndex, std::vector<T>& outColor,
129  PixelFormat pixelFormat = PixelFormat::kRGB, PixelType pixelType = PixelType::kByte8) const {
130  readColorPixels(attachmentIndex, outColor, 0, 0, m_size.x(), m_size.y(), pixelFormat, pixelType);
131  }
132  template<typename T>
133  void readColorPixels(uint32_t attachmentIndex, std::vector<T>& outColor,
134  GLint x, GLint y, GLsizei width, GLsizei height,
135  PixelFormat pixelFormat = PixelFormat::kRGB, PixelType pixelType = PixelType::kByte8) const
136  {
137  // Resize vector to appropriate size based on pixel format/type
138  uint32_t numColorEntries;
139  switch (pixelFormat) {
140  case PixelFormat::kBGR:
141  case PixelFormat::kRGB:
142  numColorEntries = 3;
143  break;
144  case PixelFormat::kBGRA:
145  case PixelFormat::kRGBA:
146  numColorEntries = 4;
147  break;
148  default:
149  Logger::Throw("Unimplemented format");
150  }
151 
152  uint32_t vecSize;
153  switch (pixelType) {
154  case PixelType::kUByte8:
155  Q_UNUSED(numColorEntries);
156  vecSize = width * height;
157  break;
158  case PixelType::kFloat16:
159  case PixelType::kFloat32:
160  vecSize = width * height * numColorEntries;
161  break;
162  default:
163  Logger::Throw("Unimplemented type");
164  }
165  outColor.resize(vecSize, -1);
166 
167  // Perform read
168  readColorPixels(attachmentIndex, outColor.data(), x, y, width, height, pixelFormat, pixelType);
169  }
170  template<typename T>
171  void readColorPixels(uint32_t attachmentIndex, T* outColor,
172  GLint x, GLint y, GLsizei width, GLsizei height,
173  PixelFormat pixelFormat = PixelFormat::kRGB, PixelType pixelType = PixelType::kByte8) const
174  {
175  switch (m_aliasingType) {
176  case AliasingType::kDefault:
177  {
178  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
179 
180  bind();
181 
182  // Read pixels directly
183  glReadBuffer(GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0 + attachmentIndex);
184  gl.glReadPixels(
185  x,
186  y,
187  width,
188  height,
189  (int)pixelFormat,
190  (int)pixelType,
191  outColor
192  );
193  break;
194  }
195  case AliasingType::kMSAA:
196  {
197  if (m_attachmentType == BufferAttachmentType::kRBO) {
198  // RBO needed for MSAA
199  // Need to blit (exchange pixels) with another framebuffer (that is not MSAA)
200  blit(BlitMask::kColorBit, *m_blitBuffer, attachmentIndex);
201  m_blitBuffer->readColorPixels(attachmentIndex, outColor, x, y, width, height, pixelFormat, pixelType);
202  }
203  else {
204  Logger::Throw("Error, MSAA FBOs with textures are not supported by current drivers");
205  }
206  break;
207  }
208  default:
209  Logger::Throw("Error, format type not recognized");
210  break;
211  }
212 
213 #ifdef DEBUG_MODE
214 #ifdef DEBUG_FBO
215  bool error = gl.printGLError("Error, failed to read color pixels");
216  if (error) {
217  Logger::Throw("Error, failed to read color pixels");
218  }
219 #endif
220 #endif
221 
222  release();
223  }
224
